vsParam:
Nice, nice to meet you!
I am Escha Malier!

Er, uh, I am a civil servant
in a small town named Colseit...

Hehe. Don't be too tense! But it's understandable,
after all, you are sent to another world all of a sudden...

Boo-hoo...
I didn't expect to encounter such a thing...

B... but, I am okay!
I believe that I can go back pretty soon!

So, before I go back,
please tell me about this world as much as possible!
You are good at adjusting your mentality!

Hee hee, being obsessed with it won't help at all!
Treasuring the present is the most important!

Yes! That's my strength!
Even if I fail... I'd feel... a little upset...

Uh, you are about the same age as us, but you are
way stronger. You are really a working people.

Ah, speaking of work, I just stepped into the society, too.
And I relied a lot on colleagues of the Colseit Branch.

Escha, I have a question to ask! You said that you are
a civil servant, so what exactly do you do?

Er, because I am an alchemist,
my works are mainly assistant works using alchemy.

And I learnt alchemy from my mother,
and I am not very good at it.

Oh, you are also an alchemist, Escha!
So you have the same identity as [px]!

In this case, why don't you study
at the Academy while staying here?

Great! You can use alchemy whenever
you want in the Academyâ™ª

Wow... I get to continue my study in alchemy in this world!
That sounds fun!

I'll be a powerful alchemist when I return to Colseit!
Everyone will be surprised!

Ha ha!
That depends on how hard you study, right?

Yes! I will study very hard!
Guys, let's help and support each other!
